channel.title: imagination on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in imagination on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Written in the moonlight
item.description: From May 2008 For too long I have absorbed. Here in this moonlight. I still see colour. I breathe. I create. There is no romantic breeze

item.title: What I learnt from my Grandmother
item.description: On Gandhiâ€™s birthday I think of two people. One is my cousin who shares his birthday and the other is my maternal grandma who taught me most of what I know about Gandhian values.
